skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Apply professional color themes and font pairings to presentations, documents, and HTML artifacts with 10 built-in themes.
skill.author: Cam10001110101

security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The scanner incorrectly flagged Markdown code formatting (backticks) as shell execution, color hex codes as cryptographic patterns, and license URLs as network risks. This is a pure styling toolkit containing only documentation and theme configuration files with no executable code.

content.value_statement: Professional presentations and documents need cohesive visual design. This skill provides 10 curated color and font themes for consistent styling, plus custom theme generation.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-built themes to presentations, documents, and HTML artifacts
Generate custom themes based on user-provided descriptions
Display a visual showcase of all available themes
Apply consistent color palettes with hex codes to artifacts
Apply complementary font pairings for headers and body text
Ensure proper contrast and readability in themed artifacts
limitations: Only provides styling guidance, does not execute code or modify files
Themes are read-only specifications, not executable templates
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or PowerPoint directly
Cannot validate theme application in all output formats

use_cases.title: Style Presentation Decks
use_cases.description: Apply a professional theme to a slide deck, ensuring consistent colors and fonts across all slides for a polished look.

use_cases.title: Create Cohesive Documents
use_cases.description: Style reports and documentation with a unified visual identity using curated color palettes and font pairings.

use_cases.title: Generate Custom Themes
use_cases.description: Create a unique theme on-the-fly based on a description, choosing appropriate colors and fonts for the specific context.

prompt_templates.title: Apply a Pre-built Theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the [theme name] theme to my presentation. Read the theme file from the themes/ directory and use its color palette and font specifications to style all slides.
prompt_templates.scenario: When user wants to use an existing theme

prompt_templates.title: Choose a Theme from Showcase
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the theme showcase so I can see all available themes. Once I select one, apply it to my artifact.
prompt_templates.scenario: When user wants to browse themes visually

prompt_templates.title: Match Theme to Context
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a theme for a [context: e.g., tech conference, luxury brand, nature documentary]. Browse the available themes and recommend the best match, then apply it.

prompt_templates.title: Create Custom Theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a custom theme based on this description: [description]. Create theme specifications including a cohesive color palette with hex codes and font pairings. Show me the theme for review before applying.
prompt_templates.scenario: When user needs a unique theme

output_examples.output:

output_examples.output:

best_practices: Show the theme showcase PDF so users can visually compare options before selecting
Get explicit confirmation from users before applying themes to their artifacts
Maintain the theme's visual identity consistently across all elements when applying
Verify color contrast and readability when applying themes to ensure accessibility
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without showing the showcase or getting user confirmation
Mixing colors from different themes rather than applying a complete theme
Ignoring the theme's intended use case (e.g., applying a nightlife theme to a corporate report)
Modifying theme files directly instead of creating custom themes when needed

faq.question: How do I see all available themes?
faq.answer: Display the theme-showcase.pdf file to see a visual preview of all 10 themes with their color palettes and font pairings.

faq.question: Can I create my own theme?
faq.answer: Yes. Describe the theme you need, and the skill will generate a custom theme with appropriate colors and fonts based on your description.

faq.question: What file formats can I apply themes to?
faq.answer: Themes can be applied to any artifact including slide decks, documents, reports, and HTML landing pages. The skill provides specifications; the AI applies them using available tools.

faq.question: Are the hex color codes guaranteed to work?
faq.answer: Hex codes are valid color specifications. However, final rendering depends on the output tool's color support and calibration.

faq.question: How do I choose the right theme?
faq.answer: Consider your audience and context. Review the theme showcase and each theme's recommended use cases. Match the theme's personality to your content's tone.

faq.question: Can I modify an existing theme?
faq.answer: Instead of modifying existing theme files, create a custom theme with your desired modifications. This keeps original themes intact for other users.
